H3.text: when was the last time someone won the super bowl back to back. 2004

A4.text: Between 2001 and 2004, the Patriots became the second team in NFL history to win three Super Bowls in four years (2001, 2003, and 2004).

A5.text: The Patriots repeated as champions between the 2003 and 2004 NFL seasons.
